p:
Satureja khuzistanica ( S. khuzistanica) is an endemic plant in southern Iran. It has an antimicrobial activity due to the presence of essential oil content.
14 The principal components of S. khuzistanica are thymol and carvacrol, which can damage bacteria. These substances, after disruption of efflux pumps, indirectly inhibit the gene expression of efflux pumps. The present study aimed to assess the reduced expression of efflux pump genes of P. aeruginosa with S. khuzistanica essential oil (SKEO).
